SELECT CCG.seq as CCGseq ,CCG.seqChar as CCGseqChar ,CCG.groupName as CCGgroupName ,CCG.groupNameEng as CCGgroupNameEng ,CCG.useYn as CCGuseYn ,CCG.regDate as CCGregDate ,CCG.delYn as CCGdelYn ,CCG.modDate as CCGmodDate ,CCG.delDate as CCGdelDate ,CCG.description as CCGdescription ,(select count(CC.seq) from commonCode CC where 1=1 and CC.delYn=0 and CC.commonCodeGroup_seq = CCG.seq AND CC.delYn = 0) as xCCcount FROM commonCodeGroup CCG WHERE 1=1
AND CCG.delYn IS NOT NULL AND CCG.delYn = #{shDelYn} AND CCG.delYn = 0
AND CCG.regDate BETWEEN #{shStartDate} AND #{shEndDate} AND CCG.modDate BETWEEN #{shStartDate} AND #{shEndDate}
AND CCG.seq = #{shValue} AND CCG.seqChar LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{shValue},'%') AND CCG.groupName LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{shValue},'%')
OR CCG.seq = #{shValue2} OR CCG.seqChar LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{shValue2},'%') OR CCG.groupName LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{shValue2},'%')

SELECT CCG.useYn AS CCGuseYn ,CCG.seq AS CCGseq ,CCG.seqChar AS CCGseqChar ,CCG.groupName AS CCGgroupName ,CCG.groupNameEng AS CCGgroupNameEng ,CCG.delYn AS CCGdelYn FROM commonCodeGroup CCG WHERE 1=1 AND CCG.seq = #{CCGseq}
